title: Slower Philippines Inflation Supports Another Rate Cut
description: Philippine inflation slowed in November, supporting another cut in the central bank’s benchmark interest rate next week as a graft scandal hits consumer and investor confidence.
content:
(Bloomberg) Philippine inflation slowed in November, supporting another cut in the central banks benchmark interest rate next week as a graft scandal hits consumer and investor confidence.
